name: Avatar
description: The Avatar component are identifiers that makes people and companies more scannable.

props.name: label
props.doc: The label description of the group of avatars.

props.name: size
props.doc: Size of the Avatar. Options: `small` | `medium` | `large` | `x-large`. Defaults to `medium`.

props.name: variant
props.doc: Override the variant of the component. Options: `primary` | `secondary` | `tertiary`. Defaults to `primary`.

props.name: maxElements
props.doc: Number of max displayed elements, including the "elements hidden text (+x)". Defaults to `4`.

props.name: skeleton
props.doc: If set to `true`, an overlaying skeleton with animation will be shown.

props.name: alt
props.doc: Used in combination with `src` to provide an alt attribute for the `img` element.

props.name: src
props.doc: Specifies the path to the image.

props.name: imgProps
props.doc: [Image properties](/uilib/elements/image) applied to the `img` element if the component is used to display an image.

props.name: icon
props.doc: An icon name or component. (Will override the `src` property.)

props.name: hasLabel
props.doc: If aria-hidden is set to `true` or if a label is given, typical inside a table or dl (definition list), then you can disable Avatar.Group as a dependent of Avatar. Use `true` to omit the `Avatar group required:` warning.

props.name: backgroundColor
props.doc: Define a custom background color, instead of a variant. Use a Eufemia color.

props.name: color
props.doc: Define a custom color to compliment the backgroundColor. Use a Eufemia color.
